text: Bonna bagenda kweyoleka mu maaso ga Katonda. Abaali abanafu bagenda kugamba abo abeekuza mazima ffe twali bagoberezi ba mmwe abaffe mulina ekintu kye muyinza okutuyamba ku bibonerezo bya Katonda, nebagamba nti singa Katonda yatuluingamya twali balungamizza, kye kimu kuffe tutidde oba tugumiikirizza tetulina wa kuddukira
